alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 22 at 1:57PM AKST until January 24 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. A chance of freezing rain and rain. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches, with localized amounts up to 9 inches, are possible. A trace of ice accumulation possible. * WHERE...Lower Yukon Valley. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Monday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 30 mph will cause widespread blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
